gamebanana.have_a_suggestion_engine: Have a suggestion for an engine? Ask on the {githubLink}!

conformations.delete_mod: Are you sure you want to COMPLETELY DELETE this mod? This action cannot be undone.
conformations.remove_mod: Are you sure you want to remove this mod from the list? This will not delete the mod files.
conformations.delete_folder: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? This action cannot be undone.

mods.no_mods_disclaimer: No mods added. Click the + button to add some!

app.name: Fridaylight
app.description: An all in one mod manager, downloader, and launcher for Friday Night Funkin' mods.

download.success_caption: Ready to play from the mods list

update.not_available_caption: This mod cannot be updated through Fridaylight.

modpack.no_engine_error_caption: "{modpackName}" requires a {engineName} instance to be installed.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of Fridaylight
appearance.custom_themes_description: Want to add custom themes? Place them in the {themesLink} folder, then click the refresh button to load them.
appearance.compact_mode_description: Minimize sidebar width and show only icons

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Configure how mods are installed and managed
installation.default_install_location_description: Set the default folder where mods will be installed
installation.validate_mods_description: Validates folder structure before installing/adding mods (might cause issues with some mods)
installation.show_terminal_output_description: Display terminal output of mods when running

about.title: About
about.bug_disclaimer: Found a bug, or have a suggestion? Report it on GitHub!
about.beta_disclaimer: This is a pre-release version of Fridaylight. It may contain bugs or incomplete features, and you should expect to lose data.

special_thanks.title: Acknowledgements and Special Thanks
special_thanks.gamebanana: For providing a stable platform for Friday Night Funkin' mods!
special_thanks.cracsthor: Created the original PhantomMuff font family files
special_thanks.noizdynamic: Created the Tardling font file used in-app
special_thanks.flmoddevteam: For providing inspiration and ideas for this app
special_thanks.steamgriddb: For providing a variety of banners and icons for engines

reset_settings.title: Reset Settings
reset_settings.description: Reset all settings to default values. You'll need to save for changes to take effect.
reset_settings.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will revert all settings to their default values.

reset_data.title: Reset App Data
reset_data.description: Reset all app data, including installed mods and settings. This will not delete your mod files.
reset_data.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all app data? This will remove all installed mods from the list and settings.

general.title: General Information
general.label: General
general.mod_description_placeholder: A brief description of the mod
general.gamebanana_sync_description: Syncing with GameBanana will fetch the latest metadata, and will overwrite any existing metadata. You'll still need to save the mod settings to apply changes.

installation.title: Installation
installation.remove_mod_description: Removing a mod will not delete the mod files, but will remove it from the list.
installation.delete_mod_description: Deleting a mod will remove it from the list and {permanentlyDelete} the mod files. This action cannot be undone.

engine.title: Engine Configuration
engine.label: Engine
engine.engine_type_description: Determines how Fridaylight will handle this mod
engine.engine_name_description: The name of the engine this mod uses (optional)
engine.mods_folder_path_description: The relative path to the mods folder from the executable. Default is 'mods'.

logo_position.title: Logo Position
logo_position.description: Position of the logo on the banner

mod_details.slow_request: This mod is taking a long time to load.
mod_details.slow_request_description: Something might have gone wrong on our end, or GameBanana's. Maybe try again later?
mod_details.might_have_malware: This mod might contain malicious software!

download_file_select.title: Select Download File
download_file_select.description: This mod, "{ modName }", has multiple download options. Please select one:
